details:

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_ecp_x_category ( id bigint(9) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, category_id bigint(9) UNSIGNED NOT NULL UNIQUE, post_id bigint(9) UNSIGNED NOT NULL UNIQUE, taxonomy varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
